docs.snippet: LEAD: The vote that House members are scheduled to take Thursday on rival Democratic and Republican plans to aid the contras will once again postpone rather than establish a real decision on United States policy toward Nicaragua, members of Congre...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The vote that House members are scheduled to take Thursday on rival Democratic and Republican plans to aid the contras will once again postpone rather than establish a real decision on United States policy toward Nicaragua, members of Congress said this weekend.

headline.main: House Vote on Contras To Defer Real Decision

docs.snippet: LEAD: IN one of several funny passages that threaten to quicken ''A Walk in the Woods'' into nearly a trot, a Soviet disarmament negotiator tells his American counterpart that the real blame for their nations' nuclear deadlock belongs to Switzerla...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: IN one of several funny passages that threaten to quicken ''A Walk in the Woods'' into nearly a trot, a Soviet disarmament negotiator tells his American counterpart that the real blame for their nations' nuclear deadlock belongs to Switzerland. With its bucolic mountains and centuries of peace, Switzerland is so soothing that it drains the urgency from diplomatic talks about Armageddon.
